name: Shivapuri Peak
description: A serene hiking haven offering breathtaking panoramic vistas of the Kathmandu Valley. Challenge yourself with a moderate hike to be rewarded with unparalleled views.

name: Nagarkot Sunrise Trail
description: Experience the magic of dawn as you witness the sun paint the Himalayan giants in hues of gold and pink. An easy trail perfect for all, making it an ideal spot to start your day.

name: Champadevi Hill
description: Embark on a spiritual journey as you ascend this sacred hill. The challenging trek is rewarded with serene ambiance and panoramic views.

name: Phulchowki Hill
description: Conquer the highest point in the Kathmandu Valley. This demanding trek through diverse flora and fauna promises an unforgettable adventure for experienced trekkers.

name: Gokarna Forest
description: Escape the city's hustle and bustle in this peaceful oasis. Enjoy easy hikes amidst lush greenery, perfect for a rejuvenating nature retreat.

name: Kakani
description: Immerse yourself in the grandeur of the Ganesh Himal and Langtang ranges. A moderate hike leads to breathtaking panoramas that will leave you spellbound.

name: Bhaktapur Durbar Square
description: Step back in time as you explore this living museum of art and architecture. Lose yourself in the intricate carvings and vibrant colors of this historic masterpiece.

name: Panauti
description: Unwind in the charm of this ancient town, renowned for its cultural heritage and stunning old houses. Take a leisurely stroll through its winding lanes and soak in the tranquil atmosphere.

name: Sundarijal
description: Your gateway to the lush Shivapuri National Park. Discover cascading waterfalls and immerse yourself in nature as you embark on a moderate trek through this verdant paradise.

name: Kulekhani Reservoir
description: Experience tranquility by the serene waters of Kulekhani Reservoir. Embark on an easy hike around the lake, surrounded by stunning natural beauty.
